com.box.sdk

Class BoxGlobalSettings

  • Object
    • BoxGlobalSettings

  • public final class BoxGlobalSettings
extends Object
    Global settings to apply to all API requests.

      Returns the current global connect timeout.
      static int getMaxRequestAttempts()
      Deprecated. 
      getMaxRetryAttempts is preferred because it more clearly gets the number of times a request should be retried after an error response is received.

      Returns the global maximum number of times an API request will be retried after an error response is received.

      • getMaxRequestAttempts

        @Deprecated
public static int getMaxRequestAttempts()
        Deprecated. getMaxRetryAttempts is preferred because it more clearly gets the number of times a request should be retried after an error response is received.
        Returns the global total maximum number of times an API request will be tried when error responses are received.
        Returns:
        max number of request attempts

public static void setMaxRequestAttempts(int attempts)
        Deprecated. setMaxRetryAttempts is preferred because it more clearly sets the number of times a request should be retried after an error response is received.
        Sets the global total maximum number of times an API request will be tried when error responses are received.
        Parameters:
        attempts - maximum number of request attempts
